overview:
Keith Williams has been developing user-centric software products and Web sites for over 20 years. Initially a developer and later a technical program and product manager, Williams has experience with large public and privately held businesses, as well as small start-ups and companies in transition. At Amazon.com for more than six years, Williams was responsible for the launch of Amazon Marketplace, as well as the first fully hosted eCommerce partners on the Amazon Services platform. Since leaving Amazon.com in 2005, Williams consulted to several Seattle area start-ups before joining Evri as Director of Product where he was responsible for the first generation of the Evri.com website and multiple partner launches including The Washington Post and Hearst Corporation. Williams is now overseeing Product Development at WealthVisor.com, a site dedicated to connecting consumers with financial, tax and insurance professionals.

Williams holds a B.S. in Psychology and Organizational Management from Gustavus Adolphus College in St. Peter, MN.
